data: At the end of each academic year, a graduation ceremony is held, where students' achievements are celebrated.
In many schools, annual sports competitions have been organized for years to encourage teamwork and physical fitness.
Since the beginning of the semester, various cultural activities have been being organized to make school life more enjoyable.
The student council has been planning a charity event to support educational projects.
The school management has introduced stress-relief programs to help students cope with exam stress.
Mental health programs will be being developed to support students dealing with school pressure.
Final exams will be scheduled earlier next year to give students more time for university applications.
Parents will attend meetings to discuss their children's progress and challenges at school.
Schools focus on mental health programs to help students cope with exam stress.
People will be celebrating national holidays with various ceremonies and traditions.
